data.name: FOUNTAINS
data.detailed_description:
FOUNTAINS on Twitter


Community Discord


About the Game

The Fountain of Youth was hidden away. Nonetheless, it is fated that a Usurper will slay the Ageless and unearth it once more.

FOUNTAINS is an action-RPG about fighting your way through a maze-like interconnected world. You'll take the role of a hooded stranger, recently imprisoned by a tyrannical regime. Will you escape and uncover the mysteries of this war-torn empire?



  • Master tight, high-skilled combat and defeat punishing bosses against all odds
  • Find new abilities and tools to help you to defend yourself and to traverse the world
  • Meet many strange characters, both hostile and friendly
  • Secrets are everywhere, so always keep an eye out!

data.short_description: Master high-skilled combat to uncover the secrets of an ancient, interconnected world.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz, dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: macOS 10.10 or newer
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz, dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Linux 64-bit x86
  • Processor: 1.2 ghz, dual-core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains violence, and cartoonish blood effects.
